title: geth --light hits exception when querying contracts
body:
Linux Ubuntu 16.04 - 64bit
Geth version: 1.5.3

#### Expected behaviour
Called the HTTP RPC to get logs from a contract, expected to see logs but gets no response.

#### Actual behaviour
console shows backtrace, no results returned to RPC

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
`geth --light` and call the HTTP RPC to get event logs

#### Backtrace

````
E1128 10:58:13.918526 rpc/server.go:152] goroutine 540 [running]:

        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/execution.go:67 +0x651
````
